subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: OTTAWA , June 17 (AP) — Brandon Watson extended his hitting streak to 43 games, breaking a 95-year-old International League record with a base hit in the Columbus Clippers’ 9-8 loss to the Ottawa Lynx on Sunday.
snippet: OTTAWA , June 17 (AP) — Brandon Watson extended his hitting streak to 43 games, breaking a 95-year-old International League record with a base hit in the Columbus Clippers’ 9-8 loss to the Ottawa Lynx on Sunday.
